tasks.title: Phase 1: Update String Resources from Briar to Mycel
tasks.description: Change all user-facing text from 'Briar' to 'Mycel' in all string resource files
tasks.details: Update briar-android/src/main/res/values/strings.xml and all 45+ localized string files in values-* directories. Change app_name from 'Briar' to 'Mycel' and update any user-visible strings containing 'Briar'.
tasks.testStrategy: Run ./gradlew test && ./gradlew :briar-android:assembleDebug to ensure UI displays 'Mycel' throughout application with no user-visible 'Briar' references.
tasks.notes: Successfully updated 51 string resource files. All 'Briar' references replaced with 'Mycel'. Committed with hash be340451.

tasks.title: Phase 2: Update Android Application ID
tasks.description: Change Android application package ID to com.quantumresearch.mycel
tasks.details: Update applicationId in briar-android/build.gradle to 'com.quantumresearch.mycel', reset version name to '1.0.0' and version code to 1. Update any references to old package ID.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify APK installs as separate application from Briar and package name verification passes using aapt dump badging.
tasks.notes: Successfully completed Phase 2: Updated Android application ID from 'org.briarproject.briar.android' to 'com.quantumresearch.mycel', reset version to 1.0.0 and version code to 1. Updated debug and screenshot variant package references. APK builds successfully with new package ID.

tasks.title: Phase 3: Rename Infrastructure Packages (Bramble Layer)
tasks.details: Systematically rename all bramble packages, update import statements across codebase, update package declarations in all affected files, and update build configurations and manifests.
tasks.testStrategy: Ensure all modules compile without package resolution errors and tests pass with new package structure.

tasks.title: Phase 4: Rename Application Packages (Briar Layer)
tasks.description: Rename all org.briarproject.briar.* packages to com.quantumresearch.mycel.app.*
tasks.details: Rename all briar packages, update import statements and package declarations, update Android manifest package references, and update service and component registrations.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify complete application compiles and runs with all features functional using new package structure.

tasks.title: Phase 5: Update Configuration and Deep Links
tasks.description: Update configuration files and change deep link scheme from briar:// to mycel://
tasks.details: Change deep link scheme, update intent filters in Android manifest, update any hardcoded URLs or schemes, and update theme and style names.
tasks.testStrategy: Test deep links work with mycel:// scheme and external app integration works correctly.

tasks.title: Phase 6: Replace Visual Assets with Mycel Branding
tasks.description: Replace all Briar visual elements with Mycel branding assets
tasks.details: Replace app launcher icons (ic_launcher*.png), update splash screen graphics, replace in-app logos and branding images, update color schemes and themes, and replace any Briar-branded graphics.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify app displays Mycel branding throughout with visual consistency across all screens and no Briar visual elements remain.

tasks.title: Phase 7: Update Documentation and External References
tasks.description: Complete rebranding with documentation updates and metadata changes
tasks.details: Update README.md with Mycel information, update all documentation files, update build script comments and metadata, and update any external reference documentation.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all documentation reflects Mycel branding and build metadata is properly configured for public release.

tasks.title: Setup Testing Infrastructure
tasks.description: Create automated testing pipeline for rebranding phases
tasks.details: Enhance test-phase.sh script, create verification scripts for each phase, and set up git commit validation.
tasks.testStrategy: Test automation scripts catch regressions and verification processes work correctly for each phase.

tasks.title: Create Mycel Visual Assets
tasks.description: Design and create new visual assets for Mycel branding
tasks.details: Design Mycel logo, create app icons in all required sizes and densities, design splash screen, and create any additional branding graphics needed.
tasks.testStrategy: Visual assets meet Android design guidelines and display correctly across all device densities.

tasks.title: Final Integration Testing and Release Preparation
tasks.description: Complete end-to-end testing and prepare for release
tasks.details: Perform comprehensive testing of all functionality, verify GPL-3.0 license compliance, test installation and upgrade scenarios, and prepare release artifacts.
tasks.testStrategy: All features work correctly, no Briar references remain, and application is ready for public distribution.
